ygData.subject: Re: Sad story, Questions, ***SPOILER ***, Laugh
ygData.msgSnippet: ... No, so no help there, sorry. ... I believe so.  It s used to resist any magic thrown at you, like Lull, Blindness, ... ... Well, two things to check on: 1.
ygData.messageBody:
> Question 1:
> Has anybody killed this guy and what level were you, etc. etc.?

No, so no help there, sorry.

> Question 2:
> Is magic resistance used to resist the mind warp?

I believe so. It's used to resist any magic thrown at you, like Lull,
Blindness, ...

>
> Question 3:
> When I was still 12th level I cast Bind on myself and my
> friend. I got a
> message that I feel bound to the area (or something like
> that). My friend
> did not. I cast it on him 4 times and he did not get that
> message. I tried
> to cast it by the gnome city if that matters. The only
> message that I got
> was that I had started to cast a spell. When we died, I
> appeared near the
> gnome city and he had a much longer walk. It appears that
> the bind did not
> work for him.

Well, two things to check on:

1. Did you group with your friend? If he's not in your group, you
can't bind him.
2. Were you BY the city or IN the city? You can only bind other
people to areas IN a city.

Aznyin
Level 12 Erudite Wizard
Current Residence: Rivervale [Solusek Ro]
